0: We wanted steaks and seafood and the gentlemen on the phone assured me their restaurant would be a perfect fit
The guest rooms are still comfortable and spacious restaurants even better and customer service spot on
New Kerby Lane Cafe opened nearby as well as The Grove which is a good wine bar restaurant
The hotel was really nice and the added touch of breakfast included was great
Restaurants have good food and the breakfast buffet has a wide variety of selections
A special savings passport program on offer through 20 August made the trip even better with savings on the restaurants spa and shopping
The breakfast was full of choices to induced lots of fresh fruit and an omelet station but many local choices as well
The pool area was nice wait staff available for drinks and lunch
The guy at bar was very nice and knowledable
1: We will not be eating at any of the restaurants until a major overhaul is done to the quality of food served
The restaurant near the pool had small tapas type menu
2: Stayed on the property for dinner and drinks and did not have to leave the resort while we were there
My steak was meh and my salad was way over dressed
I had to go to dinner with wet hair a blow dryer was in our room when we returned several hours later
After dinner we went to one on the main bars for a drink
Pool bar could use some attention a lot of mess at the bar and not super inviting for premium cocktails
The breakfast buffet was pretty good but could use a bit more variety of food
The rest if the restaurants were less than mediocre
Food is not good and the signature restaurant is closed on Sunday
At dinner she called my husband ’s cell to see if she could leave something for me in our room
Sat at the bar for over 20 minutes one night without a single server helping
